title: FEMINIST OUTRAGE: How Johnny Depp DEFEATED #MeToo
description:
Victory is Johnny's! Depp won his defamation suit against Amber Turd — we mean Heard. Let's revel in her misery together! Also, New York is empowering heroin users. And America is sending MORE money to Ukraine. That makes today perfect to kick off CULTURAL APPROPRIATION MONTH, as we salute Russia! #JohnnyDepp #AmberHeard #MeToo
